Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Susanne Ritscher				     ritscher@irt.de
Institut fuer Rundfunktechnik (IRT)		     phone: +49-89-32399-458
Floriansmuehlstr. 60, D-80939 Muenchen, Germany	     fax:   +49-89-32399-415
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test5"
	"Test5" means the 5th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test5.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test5_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test5_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test5_s.pcm	(decoded pcm file, mono surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					3
	extension				no
	transmission channel allocation		no
	phantom center				no
	prediction				no
	dynamic cross talk			no
	sampling freq.				44.1K
	LFE					no
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				yes
	bitrate base stream			256kbps
	bitrate extension stream		-
	configuration				2/1
